cast.name: 弗莱迪·默克里 Freddie Mercury

this_title: QUEEN + ADAM LAMBERT LIVE AROUND THE WORLD
introduction: Having been forced by uncertain times to shut down their planned 2020 tour, Queen and Adam Lambert bring together their personally selected live performances hand-picked from over 200 shows performed the world over. Many of Queen's biggest hits are represented here, plus some rarely performed favorites, as well as the band's entire Fire Fight Australia appearance at which they performed in full Queen's original history-making 1985 Live Aid set inchuding, of course, Freddie's famous 'Ay-Ohs'.
chinese_title: QUEEN + ADAM LAMBERT LIVE AROUND THE WORLD
